repository: Name of the repository on Github, e.g. `chime-frb-night`
project: Python compatible project name, e.g. frb_night
backend: URL prefix for backend services, .e.g `night` will yield `/maestro/night`
author: Name of the Author, e.g. Fogell McLovin
email: Contact email for the author, e.g. fogell.mclovin@hawaii-residents.com
